root: ^Camilla: Hi. It's Camilla. I'm just, I'm sorry, I'm back again. It's, it's worse by the day. I think I heard someone talking about you painting us all for the cause?

Start: ^Camilla: Like as a sign? Or.. not a sign, I mean like.. I don't know. But, if you have the time, I wouldn't mind a paint job.
Neo: ^Camilla: Yes! Neohumans! I remember that word! Is that what I am? They've got a name for us now?
NeoChoices: ^We're trying to get it to catch on.
^Call yourself whatever you'd like, I'm just the mechanic.
catchon: ^Camilla: It's not my favorite, but it's not bad either. Doesn't matter much, I'll forget it in a few minutes anyways.
catchonChoices: ^Sounds like you're in need of a memory solve.
mechanic: ^Camilla: You're not just the mechanic. You're our mechanic. I probably wouldn't even be here if it wasn't for you.
mechanicChoices: ^I just try to do whatever I can to help.
^I'm not a doctor, though. I can only help so much.
anytime: ^Camilla: Hopefully you can get my head working long enough that I can get back home.
hope: ^Camilla looks very disheveled and out of it. You're no doctor, but you'll do your best.
Back: ^It's embarassing. I got confused, I couldn't remember.. I couldn't remember where I lived. But, I came here. Maybe you can help me remember?
backChoices: ^I'll do whatever I can to help.
^This is progressing badly, but I'll try.
